title: Nadhim Zahawi – 2022 Comments Changing Support to Rishi Sunak in Conservative Leadership Contest
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nadhim Zahawi, the Conservative MP for Stratford-upon-Avon, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
A day is a long time in politics…
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[OpenRAN]: Open Radio Access Networks
  *[ONE]: Open Network Ecosystem

Given today’s news, it’s clear that we should turn to Rishi Sunak to become our next Prime Minister. Rishi is immensely talented, will command a strong majority in the parliamentary Conservative Party, and will have my full support and loyalty.
